issue.title: C++: Add null count member to Array containers, remove nullable member
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-20](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-20). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Nullability/non-nullability may become a property of the metadata (if at all, TBD based on implementation-wide discussions); in the meantime the array containers and associated algorithms will be simplified.
